title: Sibling Advicery: Starting Drag/Cheaters
description:
If you caught your friend's partner cheating would you keep it to yourself or call them immediately to tell them? Curious about starting drag but don't know where to start or how to ball on a budget? Tune in to this week's episode of Sibling Advicery where Monét and Bob answer all your questions from feeling nervous about eating a** for the first time to not knowing how to casually tell your roommate you can hear them jerk off.
Go to Everlywell.com/rivalry for 20% off your at-home lab test.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
